summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 TOYOTA COROLLA. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS) AND STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE WITHIN A REASONABLE TIME FRAME TO SCHEDULE THE RECALL REPAIR. THE DEALER (TOYOTA OF UNION CITY, 4115 JONESBORO RD, UNION CITY, GA 30291, (770) 692-2907) DID NOT GIVE A SPECIFIC DATE FOR WHEN THE PART WOULD BECOME AVAILABLE. THE DEALER ONLY INDICATED THAT THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE INTERIM RECALL NOTICE AND WOULD HAVE TO WAIT TO RECEIVE A SECOND LETTER FROM THE MANUFACTURER WITH NO ETA OF WHEN THE SECOND LETTER MAY BE MAILED TO THE CONTACT CONFIRMING THAT THE PARTS HAD BECOME AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND COULD NOT PROVIDE AN ESTIMATED DATE FOR WHEN THE CONTACTS VEHICLE WOULD RECEIVE THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT WAS NOT EXPERIENCING A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.  ...UPDATED 11/15/17 *BF
